problem: 如图,将三角板含60°角的顶点放在⊙O的圆心上,两边与⊙O交于A、B两点,点C在⊙O上,则∠ACB的度数是()
comment: 此题考查了圆周角定理．此题比较简单,注意掌握数形结合思想的应用．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, put the vertex of the triangle containing the N_0 angle on the center of ⊙O, and the two edges and ⊙O intersect at two vertices A and B, and the point C is on ⊙O, then the degree of ∠ACB is ()
